i downloaded the app bc we all love our orange small pipi president and i want to show how much i support the balding man but it all took a turn once i opened it !!! first all the power in my house went out and the temperature dropped! i didnâ€™t worry too much since my mom and brother were home but once i went out of the room to look for them, they were no where to be found. i tried calling for them but there was no answer. i even went to call but my phone had no service. i decided to try to go over to the neighbors house but the front door wouldnâ€™t let me unlock it! the lock seemed to be stuck and no matter how hard i tried it wouldnâ€™t unlock !!!! i tried every door and every window but nothing would unlock!!! i started panicking and then i started hearing whispers. many different voices were whispering over and over â€œtrump 2020â€ and got louder and louder until â€œtrump 2020â€ was being screamed. i swear i even heard the voices of some racist- i mean â€œdifferent opinionatedâ€ family members that i havenâ€™t spoken to in years. all i could hear was the voices but there was no person in sight. i started panicking so much that i could barely think straight! but then i remember that this all started the SECOND i open in app!!! i quickly opened my phone and deleted the app! as soon as it was deleted everything went back to normal! my mom was still in here room watching tv and my brother was in his playing video games! 

DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
IT IS NOT SAFE!!!!!
